message.body: Yeah!! So. We have a meeting dinner thing with a couple that Sunday but will be back at like 7:30.. We will also be around during the day. Hope that works. What time you heading into Hudson?!!
We were planning on getting to Hudson around 2.
We were thinkin BBQ times from 4 - 6 and papos show at 6. Is that cutting it too close?
Maybe need to make the shcedge a little later we are meeting wedding peeps at 4ish outta town probs be back like 6 ish
K, so we'll do the show around 8 then ?
Sounds good! Or come into town early. We will give you keys and you can hang around and do whateves till we get back
Ok, we'll plan to be in hudzone by 2, hang wit y'all, then do the show at sunset. Perfecto. So xxcited.
